Paragraph.Text: Found near the surface, Tin Ore can be smelted into Tin Bars using the smelter. Tin Bars are generally used in basic machines requiring a lightweight construction.

TwoColumnParagraph.Left:
Occurrence: Couleur Ping: 1ère Etape de l'Extraction: 2ème Etape de l'Extraction:
1ère Etape de Fonte: 2ème Etape de Fonte:
